parameters: It looks like this is a shopping street... The manhole cover leading to the sewers is open.
Head back and report to Yamashita.
If you look closely, this section of the barbed wire can be moved...
revealing the entrance to the warehouse.
Do you want to go in?
It seems that the lady's clothes have been torn by the barbed wire.

<
[3]>
[1], why aren't you taking care of the lady?
If it weren't for me supporting it for a moment————
The whole piece of clothing might be torn apart.
Let's hurry and catch up with Inukai!
You'd better hurry and chase after Inukai\|
Do you want to end today's exploration? Time will advance.
Let's execute the exploration mission first...
Would you like to end today's exploration? Time will advance.
Let's proceed with the exploration mission...
There's no need to go back through the sewers.
The safe zone is just as it was the last time I came.
\n<\n[2]>Sounds like there aren't many zombies... and not many people either.
\n<Inoshita> I heard that the shopping district was taken over by violent gangs after the outbreak.
Maybe they don't have many people left either.
The corpse of a human female in the corner doesn't seem to have been killed by zombies...
There is nothing valuable on me.

parameters.name: 高音-うそ（信じられない）

parameters: \n<\n[2]>This wound was inflicted by a human, right...
Why do we have to do this...
Humans can be far more dangerous than zombies, you never know.
The human male corpse in the corner doesn't seem to have been killed by zombies...
There is nothing valuable on me.
The door is tightly shut... I wonder if there are any survivors inside.
The door is tightly shut... I wonder if there are any survivors inside.
The door is tightly shut... not sure if there are any survivors inside.
The door is tightly shut... not sure if there are any survivors inside.
The door is tightly shut... I wonder if there are any survivors inside.
This apartment building seems to be the only place we can investigate for now...
It seems like there are recent signs of activity at the entrance of the building.
\n<Inoshita>Let's go in and take a look,
there might not be any other useful places, right?
\n<\n[2]>Anyway\..\..\.. there is still such a thick fog here...
\n<\n[3]>Madam, don't be afraid, I'll protect you from behind this time too!\|
\|Seems like there are zombies here too... proceed with caution.
Maybe it’s best to come back and finish the job after better prepared.
The cost is too high to eliminate all the zombies here...
Look around for any key locations.
The strong zombie is chained in front of the Mad Dog Gang's base entrance.
\n<\n[3]>Hey hey hey, this guy looks really strong!
Do we have to defeat him to go in?

<
[2]>
[1], make sure you are fully prepared before fighting.
\n<\n[3]>We're really awesome, let's quickly head to their lair now!
A sharp pain shoots through the leg, making movement difficult....
It seems like I was just grabbed by this zombie lunge...
\n<\n[3]>Oh no, did that guy just scratch you?!
\n<\n[3]>Can we still go through with the mission like this?
\n<\n[3]>You're right, ma'am. Let's head back first.
We have no idea what’s waiting for us in that warehouse.
\n<\n[3]>I'll be on my way now. \N[1], make sure to take good care of yourself at home.
If you ever need any \C[2]essential medicine\C[0],
just have the lady come find me~ Hehehe.
\n<\n[2]>Take a good rest these two days.
Your leg injury probably means you can't go out for now.
Maybe it’s best to come back and finish the job after better prepared.
Maybe it’s best to come back and finish the job after better prepared.
Maybe it’s best to come back and finish the job after better prepared.
\n<\n[2]>It seems like they're saying there's a secret passage in the warehouse.
The number of zombies on the shopping street has decreased significantly...
Maybe it’s best to come back and finish the job after better prepared.
Maybe it’s best to come back and finish the job after better prepared.
Maybe it’s best to come back and finish the job after better prepared.
You finally met your end at the hands of the zombies... You survived for \v[18] days in this catastrophe.
Maybe it’s best to come back and finish the job after better prepared.
